backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the ICP backend placeholder with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the asymmetric exponential smoothing change in movementDetection.ts, where the smoothed score resets to zero immediately when no movement is detected instead of decaying gradually.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted catalog of short summaries for all frontend source files, describing each module's purpose and notable implementation details.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including background, foreground, chart, and sidebar tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Squid Game app, mounting the React root div and loading the main TSX module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that composes the 3D scene, webcam overlay, HUD elements, and full-screen modal screens based on the current game phase managed by useGameState.
frontend/src/components/CountdownDisplay: Displays an animated 3-2-1 countdown with a pop-in keyframe animation and instructional text before the game starts.
frontend/src/components/EliminatedScreen: Full-screen elimination result overlay showing the player's final progress percentage, survival time, and a Try Again button.
frontend/src/components/FollowCamera.tsx: React Three Fiber component that smoothly lerps the camera position and look-at target to follow the player's Z position each frame.
frontend/src/components/GameCanvas.tsx: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/components/IdleScreen.tsx: Welcome screen displaying the game title, how-to-play instructions, and a Start Game button to begin the countdown.
frontend/src/components/Player.tsx: 3D player character built from Three.js primitives (cylinder, spheres, legs) that smoothly interpolates toward the target Z position and changes color based on game phase.
frontend/src/components/ProgressBar.tsx: Horizontal progress bar with phase-aware fill color, glow shadow, a shine overlay, and milestone tick marks at 25%, 50%, and 75%.
frontend/src/components/SensitivitySlide: Range input slider for movement detection sensitivity (1–100) with dynamic color and label (Forgiving/Normal/Strict/Brutal) based on the current value.
frontend/src/components/StatusText.tsx: Renders a pulsing GREEN LIGHT or RED LIGHT status label with phase-appropriate glow colors, returning null for non-active phases.
frontend/src/components/ThreeScene.tsx: Renders the 3D game scene using React Three Fiber, including ground, finish line, doll, lighting, player, and follow camera components based on game progress and phase.
frontend/src/components/Timer.tsx: Displays a formatted elapsed time (minutes, seconds, tenths) from a millisecond value as a styled UI component.
frontend/src/components/WebcamOverlay.ts: Renders a webcam feed with pose-tracking skeleton overlay in a fixed corner UI, reporting movement scores to the parent and showing camera/tracking status indicators.
frontend/src/components/WonScreen.tsx: Displays the win screen with final progress, elapsed time, and a 'Play Again' button after the player successfully completes the game.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and returns an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameState.ts: Custom hook managing the full Red Light/Green Light game state machine, including phase transitions, progress updates, countdown, elimination logic, and audio effects.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login, logout, and identity persistence with status tracking.
File appears to be empty or truncated with no content provided.
frontend/src/hooks/usePoseTracking.ts: React hook that initializes MediaPipe Pose, runs a requestAnimationFrame loop to process webcam frames, draws a mirrored skeleton overlay on a canvas, and returns movement score, landmarks, readiness state, and errors.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Bebas Neue and Share Tech Mono fonts, sets up Tailwind layers, defines dark-themed CSS custom properties for game UI tokens, and adds utility classes and keyframe animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/modules/gameState.ts: Defines the game state machine types, initial state, and pure functions for determining progress advancement, elimination, phase transitions, and random light durations based on movement score and sensitivity.
frontend/src/modules/movementDetection.t: Computes an exponentially-smoothed movement score from MediaPipe landmark buffers using only stable core landmarks, with a pre-filter threshold and asymmetric smoothing that resets immediately when movement stops.
frontend/src/modules/poseTracking.ts: Loads MediaPipe Pose via CDN script injection, initializes a Pose instance with configurable options, and provides a drawPoseSkeleton utility to render the skeleton on a canvas.
frontend/src/modules/scene.ts: Defines 3D scene layout constants (track length, camera offsets, colors, positions) and a helper to convert game progress (0–100) to a Z-axis world position.
frontend/src/utils/audioEffects.ts: Provides procedural Web Audio API sound effects for game events: green light, red light, elimination, victory, and countdown beep.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, extending the theme with custom game colors (pink, red, green, gold), display/mono fonts, glow box shadows, and countdown/fade-in animations. Includes the tailwindcss-animate and @tailwindcss/typography plugins.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file describing the current architecture of a Squid Game-themed browser game using React Three Fiber for 3D rendering and MediaPipe Pose for webcam-based movement detection, along with known issues, existing features, and architectural decisions.
